name: timm
description: Immutability helpers with fast reads and acceptable writes

scripts.testCovFast: npm run testCovPrepare && npm run testCovDev && npm run testCovReport
scripts.testCovFull: npm run testCovPrepare && npm run testCovDev && npm run testCovProd && npm run testCovMin && npm run testCovReport
scripts.testCovNoMin: npm run testCovPrepare && npm run testCovDev && npm run testCovProd && npm run testCovReport
scripts.compile: rm -rf ./lib && mkdir lib && babel -o lib/timm.js src/timm.js && cp src/api.js.flow lib/timm.js.flow
scripts.uglify: cross-env NODE_ENV=production envify lib/timm.js | uglifyjs - -o lib/timm.min.js --mangle --compress --comments "/^!/"
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run flow && npm run compile && npm run uglify && npm run testCovFull && npm run docs && npm run xxl
scripts.travis: npm run compile && npm run testCovNoMin

author: Guillermo Grau Panea
